jparsec.astrophysics.gildas

Class SpectrumLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.astrophysics.gildas.SpectrumLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SpectrumLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to hold data for a fitted line.
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double area
      Area of the line, K km/s.
      double areaError
      Area error of the line, K km/s.
      static java.awt.Color[] col
      List of colors.
      int colorIndex
      Color index. -1 to set it automatically.
      static java.lang.String[] colors
      The names of the colors in the list.
      boolean deleted
      True to consider this line as deleted.
      java.lang.String[] diagrotIDs
      Holds the title of the rotational diagrams that this line belongs to, if any.
      boolean enabled
      True to consider this line in the fit and output it in the results.
      boolean fitted
      True if the line is already fitted accurately, after reducing the spectrum.
      double freq
      Frequency of the line in MHz.
      java.lang.String label
      Line label.
      java.lang.String labelForChartID
      Special label used for advanced charting with Gildas.
      int lineIndex
      The index of this line in the set of lines for this spectrum.
      int maxChannel
      Minimum and maximum channels where the line is within.
      int minChannel
      Minimum and maximum channels where the line is within.
      double peakT
      Peak temperature of the line, K.
      double peakTError
      Peak temperature uncertainty of the line, K.
      int spectrumIndex
      The index of this line in the set of spectra.
      double vel
      Velocity of the central position of the line, km/s.
      double velError
      Error in the estimate of the central velocity, km/s.
      double width
      Width of the Gaussian in km/s.
      double widthError
      Error in the width of the line, km/s.
      double yMax
      Maximum and minimum y limits to do the fit.
      double yMin
      Maximum and minimum y limits to do the fit.

      Constructor and Description
      SpectrumLine(double[] lineParam)
      Constructs a spectrum line object by giving a set of Gaussian Parameters resulting from ProcessSpectrum.fitLines(boolean).

      • SpectrumLine

        public SpectrumLine(double[] lineParam)
        Constructs a spectrum line object by giving a set of Gaussian Parameters resulting from ProcessSpectrum.fitLines(boolean).

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public SpectrumLine clone()
        Clones this instance.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string object with the parameters of the Gaussian.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getLatexTable

        public static java.lang.String getLatexTable(SpectrumLine[] sl0,
                             java.lang.String title)
                                      throws JPARSECException
        Generates a Latex table with the results of the line fitting. Lines are sorted by increasing order of frequencies.
        Parameters:
        sl0 - Lines fitted.
        title - Table title.
        Returns:
        Table code.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getGaussianParameters

        public double[] getGaussianParameters()
        Returns the Gaussian parameters of this line in the same way as the method ProcessSpectrum.fitLines(boolean).
        Returns:
        Coefficients of the fit, 8 values: Gaussian x central position (km/s), Gaussian width (km/s), Gaussian peak (K), Gaussian area (K km/s), and their errors. Additional values given are the minimum channel (at v = v0 - w), the maximum channel value, and the frequency in MHz.
